00059 // statics 
00060 std::string DispatchError::buil_msg(goal_id const &g, std::string const &msg) throw() {
00061   std::ostringstream oss;
00062   oss<<"While dispatching ";
00063   if( !!g ) 
00064     oss<<g->object()<<'.'<<g->predicate();
00065   oss<<'['<<g<<"]: "<<msg;
00066   return oss.str();
00067 }

00071 /* 
00072  * class TREX::transaction::details::external
00073  */
00074 
00075 bool TREX::transaction::details::external::cmp_goals(IntegerDomain const &a, IntegerDomain const &b) {
00076   // sorting order
00077   //   - based on upperBound
00078   //   - if same upperBound : sorted base on lower bound
00079   //
00080   // this way I can safely update lower bounds without impacting tokens order
00081   return a.upperBound()<b.upperBound() ||
00082     ( a.upperBound()==b.upperBound() && a.lowerBound()<b.lowerBound() );
00083 }

00088 TREX::transaction::details::external::external() {
00089   m_pos = m_last; // may not be necessary but I just want  ot be sure ...
00090 }

00092 TREX::transaction::details::external::external(details::external const &other) 
00093   :m_pos(other.m_pos), m_last(other.m_last) {}

00095 TREX::transaction::details::external::external(details::external_set::iterator const &pos,
00096                                           details::external_set::iterator const &last, 
00097                                           bool only_active)
00098   :m_pos(pos), m_last(last) {
00099   if( only_active )
00100     next_active();
00101 }

00103 // manipulators
00104 
00105 details::goal_queue::iterator details::external::lower_bound(IntegerDomain const &dom) {
00106   details::goal_queue::iterator i = m_pos->second.begin();
00107   
00108   for(; m_pos->second.end()!=i && cmp_goals((*i)->getStart(), dom); ++i);
00109   return i;
00110 }
00111 
00112 // modifiers 
00113 
00114 bool details::external::post_goal(goal_id const &g) {
00115   IntegerDomain const &g_start(g->getStart());
00116   // locate goal position
00117   details::goal_queue::iterator i = lower_bound(g_start);
00118 
00119   // check that it is not already posted
00120   for( ; m_pos->second.end()!=i && !cmp_goals(g_start, (*i)->getStart()); ++i)
00121     if( g==(*i) )
00122       return false;
00123   // insert the new goal
00124   m_pos->second.insert(i, g);
00125   return true;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void details::external::dispatch(TICK current, details::goal_queue &sent) {
00129   details::goal_queue::iterator i=m_pos->second.begin();
00130   IntegerDomain dispatch_w = m_pos->first.dispatch_window(current);
00131   
00132   for( ; m_pos->second.end()!=i && (*i)->startsBefore(dispatch_w.upperBound());  ) {
00133     if( (*i)->startsAfter(current) ) {
00134       // Need to check for dispatching
00135       if( m_pos->first.accept_goals() ) {
00136        syslog()<<"Dispatching "<<(*i)->predicate()<<'['<<(*i)<<"] on \""
00137               <<m_pos->first.name()<<"\".";
00138        m_pos->first.request(*i);
00139        i = m_pos->second.erase(i);
00140       } else 
00141        ++i;
00142     } else {
00143       syslog()<<"Goal "<<(*i)->predicate()<<'['<<(*i)<<"] is in the past !";
00144       i = m_pos->second.erase(i);
00145     }
00146   } 
00147 }
00148 
00149 void details::external::recall(goal_id const &g) {
00150   IntegerDomain const &g_start(g->getStart());
00151   // locate goal position
00152   details::goal_queue::iterator i = lower_bound(g_start);
00153   for( ; m_pos->second.end()!=i && !cmp_goals(g_start, (*i)->getStart()); ++i)
00154     if( g==(*i) ) {
00155       // was still pending => just remove it
00156       m_pos->second.erase(i);
00157       return;
00158     }
00159   // not found => send a recall
00160   m_pos->first.recall(g);
00161 }
00162  
00163 details::external &details::external::operator++() {
00164   if( valid() ) {
00165     ++m_pos;
00166     next_active();
00167   }
00168   return *this;
00169 }
00170 
00171 void details::external::next_active() {
00172   while( valid() && !m_pos->first.active() )
00173     ++m_pos;
00174 }
00175 
00176 // observers 
00177 
00178 bool details::external::operator==(details::external const &other) const {
00179   if ( valid() )
00180     return m_pos == other.m_pos;
00181   else 
00182     return !other.valid();
00183 }
00184 
00185 TREX::utils::internals::LogEntry details::external::syslog() {
00186   return m_pos->first.client().syslog(m_pos->first.name().str());
00187 }

00196 TeleoReactor::TeleoReactor(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type &arg, bool loadTL)
00197   :m_inited(false), m_firstTick(true), m_graph(*(arg.second)),
00198    m_trLog(NULL),
00199    m_name(parse_attr<Symbol>(xml_factory::node(arg), "name")),
00200    m_latency(parse_attr<TICK>(xml_factory::node(arg), "latency")),
00201    m_maxDelay(0),
00202    m_lookahead(parse_attr<TICK>(xml_factory::node(arg), "lookahead")),
00203    m_nSteps(0) {
00204   boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &node(xml_factory::node(arg));
00205   
00206   if( parse_attr<bool>(true, node, "log") ) {
00207     std::string log = manager().file_name(getName().str()+".tr.log");
00208     m_trLog = new Logger(log);
00209     syslog()<<"Transactions logged to "<<log;
00210   }
00211 
00212   if( loadTL ) {
00213     Symbol tl_name;
00214     // Add external file content
00215     ext_xml(node.second, "config");
00216     
00217     for(boost::property_tree::ptree::iterator i=node.second.begin();
00218        node.second.end()!=i; ++i) {
00219       if( is_tag(*i, "External") ) {
00220        tl_name = parse_attr<Symbol>(*i, "name");
00221        if( tl_name.empty() )
00222          throw XmlError(*i, "Timlines cannot have an empty name");
00223        use(tl_name, parse_attr<bool>(true, *i, "goals"));
00224       } else if( is_tag(*i, "Internal") ) {
00225        tl_name = parse_attr<Symbol>(*i, "name");
00226        if( tl_name.empty() )
00227          throw XmlError(*i, "Timlines cannot have an empty name");
00228        provide(tl_name);
00229       }
00230     }
00231   }
00232 }
00233    
00234 TeleoReactor::TeleoReactor(graph *owner, Symbol const &name, 
00235                         TICK latency, TICK lookahead, bool log)
00236   :m_inited(false), m_firstTick(true), m_graph(*owner), m_trLog(NULL),
00237    m_name(name),
00238    m_latency(latency), m_maxDelay(0), m_lookahead(lookahead),
00239    m_nSteps(0) {
00240   if( log ) {
00241     std::string log = manager().file_name(getName().str()+".tr.log");
00242     m_trLog = new Logger(log);
00243     syslog()<<"Transactions logged to "<<log;
00244   }
00245 }
00246 
00247 TeleoReactor::~TeleoReactor() {
00248   isolate();
00249   if( NULL!=m_trLog )
00250     delete m_trLog;
00251 }

00255 bool TeleoReactor::isInternal(TREX::utils::Symbol const &timeline) const {
00256   return m_internals.end()!=m_internals.find(timeline);
00257 }
00258 
00259 bool TeleoReactor::isExternal(TREX::utils::Symbol const &timeline) const {
00260   return m_externals.end()!=m_externals.find(timeline);
00261 }

00263 details::external TeleoReactor::ext_begin() {
00264   return details::external(m_externals.begin(), m_externals.end());
00265 }
00266 
00267 details::external TeleoReactor::ext_end() {
00268   return details::external(m_externals.end(), m_externals.end());
00269 }

00271 details::external TeleoReactor::find_external(TREX::utils::Symbol const &name) {
00272   return details::external(m_externals.find(name), m_externals.end());

00275 // modifers/callbacks
00276 
00277 double TeleoReactor::workRatio() {
00278   if( hasWork() ) {
00279     double ret = m_deadline;
00280     ret -= getCurrentTick();
00281     if( ret<=0.0 ) 
00282       ret = m_nSteps+1;
00283     else {
00284       ret += 1.0;
00285       ret *= m_nSteps+1;
00286     }
00287     return 1.0/ret;
00288   } else {
00289     m_nSteps = 0;
00290     m_deadline = getCurrentTick()+1+getLatency();
00291     return NAN;
00292   }
00293 }
00294 
00295 void TeleoReactor::postObservation(Observation const &obs) {
00296   internal_set::iterator i = m_internals.find(obs.object());
00297   
00298   if( m_internals.end()==i )
00299     throw SynchronizationError(*this, "attempted to post observation on "+
00300                             obs.object().str()+" which is not Internal.");
00301   
00302   (*i)->postObservation(getCurrentTick(), obs);
00303   m_updates.insert(*i);
00304   // syslog("ASSERT")<<obs;
00305 }
00306 
00307 bool TeleoReactor::postGoal(goal_id const &g) {
00308   if( !g ) 
00309     throw DispatchError(*this, g, "Invalid goal Id");
00310 
00311   details::external tl(m_externals.find(g->object()), m_externals.end(), false);
00312   
00313   if( tl.valid() ) {
00314     bool ret = tl.post_goal(g);
00315     if( ret && NULL!=m_trLog )
00316       m_trLog->request(g);
00317     return ret;
00318   } else 
00319     throw DispatchError(*this, g, "Goals can only be posted on External timelines");
00320 }
00321 
00322 goal_id TeleoReactor::postGoal(Goal const &g) {
00323   goal_id tmp(new Goal(g));
00324   
00325   if( postGoal(tmp) )
00326     return tmp;
00327   else {
00328     // should never happen !?
00329     return goal_id();
00330   }
00331 }
00332 
00333 bool TeleoReactor::postRecall(goal_id const &g) {
00334   if( !g )
00335     return false;
00336   details::external tl(m_externals.find(g->object()), m_externals.end());
00337 
00338   if( tl.valid() ) {
00339     tl.recall(g);
00340     if( NULL!=m_trLog ) 
00341       m_trLog->recall(g);
00342     return true;
00343   }
00344   return false;
00345 }
00346 
00347 bool TeleoReactor::initialize(TICK final) {
00348   if( m_inited ) {
00349     syslog("ERROR")<< "Attempted to initalize this reactor twice.";
00350     return false;
00351   }
00352   m_initialTick = getCurrentTick(); 
00353   m_finalTick   = final;
00354   syslog()<<"Creation tick is "<<getInitialTick();
00355   syslog()<<"Execution latency is "<<getExecLatency();
00356   try {
00357     handleInit();   // allow derived class initialization
00358     m_firstTick = true;
00359     m_inited = true;
00360     return true;
00361   } catch(TREX::utils::Exception const &e) {
00362     syslog("ERROR")<<"Exception caught during init :\n"<<e;
00363   } catch( std::exception const &se) {
00364     syslog("ERROR")<<"C++ exception caught during init :\n"<<se.what();
00365   } catch(...) {
00366     syslog("ERROR")<<"Unknown exception caught during init";
00367   }
00368   return false;
00369 }
00370 
00371 void TeleoReactor::newTick() {
00372   if( m_firstTick ) {
00373     if( getCurrentTick()!=m_initialTick ) {
00374       syslog("WARN")<<"Updating initial tick from "<<m_initialTick
00375                   <<" to "<<getCurrentTick();
00376       m_initialTick = getCurrentTick();
00377     }
00378     m_firstTick = false;
00379   }
00380   if( NULL!=m_trLog )
00381     m_trLog->newTick(getCurrentTick());
00382 
00383   handleTickStart(); // allow derived class processing
00384 
00385   // Dispatched goals management
00386   details::external i = ext_begin();
00387   details::goal_queue dispatched; // store the goals that got dispatched on this tick ...
00388                               // I do nothing with it for now  
00389   // Manage goal dispatching
00390   for( ; i.valid(); ++i )
00391     i.dispatch(getCurrentTick(), dispatched);  
00392 }
00393 
00394 void TeleoReactor::doNotify() {
00395   for(external_set::iterator i = m_externals.begin();
00396       m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) 
00397     if( i->first.lastObsDate()==getCurrentTick() )
00398       notify( i->first.lastObservation() );
00399 }
00400   
00401 
00402 bool TeleoReactor::doSynchronize() {
00403   try {
00404     // Update the timelines here !
00405     if( synchronize() ) {
00406       for(internal_set::const_iterator i=m_updates.begin();
00407          m_updates.end()!=i; ++i) {
00408        syslog("ASSERT")<<(*i)->lastObservation();
00409        if( NULL!=m_trLog )
00410          m_trLog->observation((*i)->lastObservation());
00411       }
00412       m_updates.clear();
00413       return true;
00414     }
00415   } catch(Exception const &e) {
00416     syslog("SYNCH")<<"Exception caught: "<<e;
00417   } catch(std::exception const &se) {
00418     syslog("SYNCH")<<"C++ exception caught: "<<se.what();
00419   } catch(...) {
00420     syslog("SYNCH")<<"Unknown exception caught.";
00421   }
00422   syslog("ERROR")<<"Failed to synchronize.";
00423   return false;
00424 }
00425 
00426 void TeleoReactor::step() {
00427   resume();
00428   m_nSteps += 1;
00429 }
00430 
00431 void TeleoReactor::use(TREX::utils::Symbol const &timeline, bool control) {
00432   if( !m_graph.subscribe(this, timeline, control) )
00433     if( isInternal(timeline) )
00434       syslog("WARN")<<"External declaration of the Internal timeline \""
00435              <<timeline.str()<<"\"";
00436     else
00437       syslog("WARN")<<"Multiple External declarations of timeline \""
00438              <<timeline.str()<<"\"";
00439 }
00440 
00441 void TeleoReactor::provide(TREX::utils::Symbol const &timeline, bool controllable) {
00442   if( !m_graph.assign(this, timeline, controllable) )
00443     if( isInternal(timeline) ) {
00444       syslog("WARN")<<"Promoted \""<<timeline.str()<<"\" from External to Internal.";
00445     }
00446 }
00447   
00448 void TeleoReactor::clear_internals() {
00449   while( !m_internals.empty() ) {
00450     m_internals.front()->unassign(getCurrentTick());
00451   }
00452 }
00453 
00454 void TeleoReactor::clear_externals() {
00455   while( !m_externals.empty() ) {
00456     Relation r = m_externals.begin()->first;
00457     r.unsubscribe();
00458   }
00459 }
00460 
00461 void TeleoReactor::assigned(details::timeline *tl) {
00462   m_internals.insert(tl);
00463   syslog()<<"Declared \""<<tl->name()<<"\".";  
00464   if( NULL!=m_trLog ) {
00465     m_trLog->provide(tl->name());
00466   }
00467   for(graph::listen_set::const_iterator i=m_graph.m_listeners.begin();
00468       m_graph.m_listeners.end()!=i; ++i)
00469     (*i)->declared(*tl);
00470 }
00471 
00472 void TeleoReactor::unassigned(details::timeline *tl) {
00473   internal_set::iterator i = m_internals.find(tl);
00474   m_internals.erase(i);
00475   syslog()<<"Undeclared \""<<tl->name()<<"\".";
00476   if( NULL!=m_trLog ) {
00477     m_trLog->unprovide(tl->name());
00478   }
00479   for(graph::listen_set::const_iterator i=m_graph.m_listeners.begin();
00480       m_graph.m_listeners.end()!=i; ++i)
00481     (*i)->undeclared(*tl);
00482 }
00483 
00484 void TeleoReactor::subscribed(Relation const &r) {
00485   external_set::value_type tmp;
00486   tmp.first = r;
00487   m_externals.insert(tmp);
00488   latency_updated(0, r.latency());
00489   syslog()<<"Subscribed to \""<<r.name()<<"\".";
00490   if( NULL!=m_trLog ) {
00491     m_trLog->use(r.name());
00492   }
00493 }
00494 
00495 void TeleoReactor::unsubscribed(Relation const &r) {
00496   external_set::iterator i = m_externals.find(Relation::get_id(r));
00497   // No need to control that i is valid 
00498   //    - this call comes from timeline::unsubscribe so
00499   //      which calls it only to the client of r -> me
00500   if( !i->second.empty() ) {
00501     latency_updated(r.latency(), 0);
00502   }
00503   // remove this relation
00504   m_externals.erase(i);
00505   syslog()<<"Unsubscribed from \""<<r.name()<<"\".";
00506   if( NULL!=m_trLog ) {
00507     m_trLog->unuse(r.name());
00508   }
00509 }
00510 
00511 
00512 void TeleoReactor::latency_updated(TICK old_l, TICK new_l) {
00513   TICK prev = m_maxDelay;
00514 
00515   if( new_l>m_maxDelay )     
00516     m_maxDelay = new_l;    
00517   else if( old_l==m_maxDelay ) {
00518     // special case : the updated value is smaller and the old value is 
00519     //                equal to my former exec delay
00520     //                this means that on of the timelines that were
00521     //                constraining my maxDelay has just reduced its latency
00522     m_maxDelay = new_l;
00523     // I need to check what is the new maximum from there
00524     for(details::external i = ext_begin(); i.valid(); ++i)
00525       m_maxDelay = std::max(m_maxDelay, i->latency());
00526   }
00527   if( m_maxDelay!=prev ) {
00528     // It may be anoying on the long run but for now I will log when this
00529     // exec latency changes
00530     syslog()<<" Execution latency updated from "<<prev<<" to "<<m_maxDelay;
00531     // Notify all the reactors that depend on me
00532     for(internal_set::iterator i=m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) 
00533       (*i)->latency_update(getLatency()+prev);
00534   }
00535 }

00546 TeleoReactor::Logger::~Logger() {
00547   if( m_tick ) {
00548     if( m_hasData ) 
00549       m_file<<"  </tick>\n";
00550   } else 
00551     m_file<<"  </header>\n";
00552   m_file<<"</log>";
00553 }

00574 
00575 void TeleoReactor::Logger::newTick(TICK val) {
00576   if( m_tick ) {
00577     if( m_hasData ) 
00578       m_file<<"  </tick>"<<std::endl;    
00579   } else {
00580     m_file<<"  </header>"<<std::endl;
00581     m_tick = true;
00582   }
00583   m_hasData = false;
00584   m_current = val;
00585 }
00586 
00587 void TeleoReactor::Logger::openTick() {
00588   if( m_tick ) {
00589     if( !m_hasData ) {
00590       m_file<<"  <tick value=\""<<m_current<<"\">\n";
00591       m_hasData = true;
00592     }
00593   }
00594 }

00599   obs.toXml(m_file, 4)<<std::endl;
